name: Texor.cloud
description: Texor.Cloud - $TXR is a next-generation no-code AI automation platform designed to make building and scaling AI agents simple, accessible, and open. Users can create powerful workflows for trading, research, blockchain interactions, alerts, and more using an intuitive drag-and-drop interface. With real-time execution, scheduling, and seamless API and webhook integrations, Texor.Cloud removes coding barriers and centralizes automation in one platform. The AI Agent Marketplace allows creators to share or monetize their agents, while universal integrations connect with apps, wallets, smart contracts, and on-chain data. Texor.Cloud puts automation back into the hands of innovators, making AI creation faster, easier, and truly decentralized.
